org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.rest

Class RestJsonAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.rest.RestJsonAPI

  • @Path(value="/json/")
public class RestJsonAPI
extends Object
    JSON Rest API, main API, since the XML API has been depreciated.
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy

      • simulateRemediationInAttackGraph

        @GET
@Path(value="attack_path/{id}/remediation/{id-remediation}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response simulateRemediationInAttackGraph(@Context
                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                           @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                           int id,
                                                                           @PathParam(value="id-remediation")
                                                                           int id_remediation)
                                                           throws Exception
        Simulate the remediation id_remediation of the path id, and compute the new attack graph
        Parameters:
        request - the HTTP Request
        id - the identifier of the attack path for which the remediations will be computed
        id_remediation - the identifier of the remediation to simulate
        Returns:
        the HTTP Response

        Exception
